HeroSection.heading: Plan, Execute, and Publish
HeroSection.subHeading: Manage all your social media accounts with the help of AI

FeatureSection.heading: Everything you need to succeed
FeatureSection.subHeading: Built for Arabic content creators with powerful AI and seamless multi-platform publishing

ai.title: AI Content Generation
ai.description: Generate engaging Arabic captions, hashtags, and alt text with AI trained for MENA audiences. Support for MSA and Gulf dialects.

schedule.title: Smart Scheduling
schedule.description: Schedule posts across multiple platforms with timezone support, recurring posts, and drag-and-drop calendar management.

analytics.title: Analytics & Reports
analytics.description: Track engagement metrics, analyze trends, and export detailed reports. Campaign-level insights across all platforms.

team.title: Team Collaboration
team.description: Invite team members, assign roles, and manage approval workflows. Perfect for agencies managing multiple clients.

publish.title: Reliable Publishing
publish.description: Independent status tracking per platform with automatic retries, webhooks, and real-time notifications for every post.

rtl.title: RTL Support
rtl.description: Full right-to-left UI support with Arabic typography. Switch between Arabic and English seamlessly.

PricingSection.heading: Simple, transparent pricing
PricingSection.subHeading: Choose the plan that fits your needs. All plans include AI generation and multi-platform support.

CtaSection.heading: Ready to transform your social media?
CtaSection.subHeading: Join thousands of creators and businesses using YSHAI to schedule smarter and grow faster.

FooterSection.description: Arabic-first AI social media scheduler for the MENA region.

aiAdvisor.title: AI Content Advisor
aiAdvisor.description: Get personalized recommendations and insights to improve your content strategy
aiAdvisor.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your AI content advisor. I can help you optimize your content strategy, suggest the best times to post, analyze your audience, and provide creative content ideas. How can I assist you today?
aiAdvisor.inputPlaceholder: Ask me anything about your content strategy...
aiAdvisor.quickAction1: What's the best time to post?
aiAdvisor.sampleResponse1: Based on your audience engagement patterns, the best times to post are between 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM on weekdays. Your audience is most active during these hours, which could increase your engagement by up to 35%.
aiAdvisor.sampleResponse2: Your recent posts show strong performance! Your engagement rate has increased by 12% this month. Posts with images perform 45% better than text-only posts. Consider adding more visual content to maintain this growth.
aiAdvisor.sampleResponse3: Here are some content ideas tailored to your audience: 1) Behind-the-scenes content about your workflow, 2) Tips and tricks related to your industry, 3) User-generated content showcasing customer success stories. These types of posts typically generate 2x more engagement.
